title: Boutique, Adults-Only Glamour by the Murray River with Butler Service
description: Discover chic 20th-century style alongside modern facilities on the banks of the Murray River at the adults-only Circa 1936 in Corowa, New South Wales. Experience style and opulence in the rural Rutherglen wine region-sitting on the border of Victoria and New South Wales-and unwind with daily a la carte breakfast, a nightly treat delivered to your suite, daily minibar access, 90-minute couplesâ€™ spa treatment, butler service and more.
